### Graduate School Admissions

#### The Data

```{r, chunk10.22}
data(UCBadmit)
Admit <- UCBadmit %>% 
  mutate(male = ifelse(applicant.gender == "male", 1, 0))
head(Admit, 3)
```

#### Model 1

```{r, chunk10.23a}
model1 <- 
  map(
    alist(admit ~ dbinom(applications, p),
          logit(p) <- a,
          a ~ dnorm(0, 10)),
    data = Admit,
    start = list(a = 5))
```

#### Model 2

```{r, chunk10.23}
model2 <-  
  map(
    alist(
      admit ~ dbinom(applications, p),
      logit(p) <- a + bm * male,
      a ~ dnorm(0, 10),
      bm ~ dnorm(0, 10)
    ),
    data = Admit)
precis(m10.6)
```



#### R Code 10.24

```{r, chunk10.24}
compare(m10.6, m10.7)
```
